title: You can now add multiple Google Search Console accounts.

content.value: One Foudroyer account to rule them all.

content.content: Many of you have multiple Google Search Console accounts. Now, instead of creating multiple Foudroyer accounts, you can simply connect to your favorite account, and centralize all your accounts.

This is a new feature, so I need your feedback. I'm available via support if you have any problems or recommendations. 



Thanks a lot!

description: It's a feature many have been asking for, and it's officially live. Connect all your Google Search Console accounts in a single Foudroyer account.
